snippet: As a bank operating on Wall Street, Standard Chartered must play by the rules or suffer the consequences. But is the U.S. pushing others to fight its battles in the sanctions campaign against Iran? Is it working?
abstract: As a bank operating on Wall Street, Standard Chartered must play by the rules or suffer the consequences. But is the U.S. pushing others to fight its battles in the sanctions campaign against Iran? Is it working?

headline.main: British Bank Fights U.S. Charges of Dealing With Iran
